title: Computer Activity
description: The Computer Activity dataset captures system metrics from a multi-user Sun Sparcstation 20/712 at 5-second intervals, intended for regression analysis to predict system performance based on varied user tasks.

target.name: usr
target.description: Portion of time (%) that cpus run in user mode.

features.name: lread
features.description: lread - Reads (transfers per second ) between system memory and user memory.

features.name: lwrite
features.description: lwrite - writes (transfers per second) between system memory and user memory.

features.name: scall
features.description: scall - Number of system calls of all types per second.

features.name: sread
features.description: sread - Number of system read calls per second.

features.name: swrite
features.description: swrite - Number of system write calls per second .

features.name: fork
features.description: fork - Number of system fork calls per second.

features.name: exec
features.description: exec - Number of system exec calls per second.

features.name: rchar
features.description: rchar - Number of characters transferred per second by system read calls.

features.name: wchar
features.description: wchar - Number of characters transfreed per second by system write calls.

features.name: pgout
features.description: pgout - Number of page out requests per second.

features.name: ppgout
features.description: ppgout - Number of pages, paged out per second.

features.name: pgfree
features.description: pgfree - Number of pages per second placed on the free list.

features.name: pgscan
features.description: pgscan - Number of pages checked if they can be freed per second.

features.name: atch
features.description: atch - Number of page attaches (satisfying a page fault by reclaiming a page in memory) per second.

features.name: pgin
features.description: pgin - Number of page-in requests per second.

features.name: ppgin
features.description: ppgin - Number of pages paged in per second.

features.name: pflt
features.description: pflt - Number of page faults caused by protection errors (copy-on-writes).

features.name: vflt
features.description: vflt - Number of page faults caused by address translation.

features.name: runqsz
features.description: runqsz - Process run queue size.

features.name: freemem
features.description: freemem - Number of memory pages available to user processes.

features.name: freeswap
features.description: freeswap - Number of disk blocks available for page swapping.
